basics.name: Yutong Zhu
basics.summary: MDes in Design Futures at Royal College of Art. Research focuses on Human-AI Interaction, Co-Creation, and Embodied Intelligence in HCI.

work.company: Royal College of Art - Wicked Acceleration Lab & RCA AI Club
work.summary: Agent-Centered Future Education System research. Contributing to projects exploring AI visualization of Chinese traditional culture.
highlights: Designed and prototyped three AI collaborative tools—Reframe, Reflect, and Rethink—to study human–AI cognitive co-reflection in higher education
Developed behavioral experiments testing six AI personas to assess their impact on learning trust, autonomy, and reflection depth
Co-authored paper 'Speculative Design Meets AI: Exploring Creative Dynamics through Co-Speculative Workshops' (HCII 2025)

work.company: AICreativityLab, SCFAI & The Parsons, New York
work.summary: BambooWind & Poetic Imagery and Shape Charm projects. Led AI GAN models for calligraphic style transfer and text-to-3D translation pipeline.
highlights: Co-trained GAN models for calligraphic style transfer, transforming bamboo-leaf brushstrokes into font strokes
Independently led AIGC text-to-3D translation pipeline, integrating ComfyUI, Diffusion models, and LLM-based semantic parsing
Publications prepared for submission to AAAI; installations exhibited at Chengdu Art Museum and Luo Zhongli Art Museum

work.company: Center for Brain Science and Art, Chongqing University
work.summary: EEG-Based Wearable Neurofeedback Device for eSports. Collected and labeled EEG data from 78 professional gamers.
highlights: Designed the interaction interface bridging neuroscience and user experience
Led experiments that enabled the prototype Syncohe, a neurofeedback-based focus training system
Recognized by Spark, EPDA, and IDA design awards

work.company: Royal College of Art × Sodexo France – AiD Lab
work.summary: SmartTaste – AI-Driven Dining Experience System. Researched AI's role in sustainable service ecosystems.
highlights: Co-designed an intelligent canteen interface using AI recommendation algorithms and multimodal feedback loops
Built the Smart Taste Index (STI) model analyzing taste preference and nutritional data
Prototype deployed in Sodexo's internal canteen, improving satisfaction and meal turnover

work.summary: L4-Level Human–AI Co-Driving Cockpit. Focused on EMG and cognitive eye-gaze analysis to detect driver fatigue.
highlights: Designed a multimodal fatigue-intervention prototype combining visual HUD, tactile feedback, and voice cues
Reduced reaction delay by ≈30% in user testing
Project received Red Dot Design nomination

work.summary: Theme Design Team. Led design and launch of two mobile themes and corresponding watch face designs.
highlights: Conducted extensive user surveys and keyword trend analysis
Led design and launch of two mobile themes on Huawei Theme Store
Contributed to lockscreen interactions, widget design, and overall theme interaction design

work.summary: TikTok Effects workshop. Designed and launched six filters on TikTok and TikTok Lite.
highlights: Designed and launched six filters, garnering over 1,000 interactions and in excess of 10,000 views
One filter gained a feature on TikTok's official homepage
Developed custom effects across three key categories: beauty transformation, scene atmosphere, and fun AR
